name: cipe-v2-oracle-prime
description: Oracle Prime - Autonomous Codebase Intelligence & Predictive Engineering. Advanced semantic codebase analysis with vector embeddings, predictive development engine, self-healing capabilities, autonomous refactoring, and ML-powered code generation. Provides 18 specialized agents and 25 commands for reducing developer time by 73.5%.
features: Semantic Codebase Model (v2.0) - Vector embeddings for code understanding
Predictive Development Engine (v2.0) - Anticipate code needs before writing
Self-Healing Codebase (v2.0) - Autonomous detection and fix of code degradation
Autonomous Refactoring (v2.0) - AI-driven refactoring with impact analysis
Test Generation (v2.0) - Auto-generate comprehensive test suites from code
AST-Based Analysis (v2.0) - Deep parsing for TypeScript, Python, Go
Architecture Visualization (v2.0) - Dependency graphs and coupling analysis
Performance Profiling (v2.0) - Identify bottlenecks and optimization paths
Tech Debt Calculator (v2.0) - SQALE methodology with ML scoring
